name: Luke Walkup
review:
I love this church! I became a member here in May of 2011 while I was attending West Virginia University. The preaching of the Word is edifying and Christ-centered as the pastor constantly points our hearts heavenward. I have found the people here to be friendly and hospitable. I hope people find me to be the same. :)

I hope that you come and worship the Lord with us and grow in knowledge and love.

name: Debbie F
review: Warm fellowship and deeply meaningful worship.

name: Dan & Mary Powell
review: Great preaching of the Word and the people are loving and caring.
